verses.text: “\w Cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w aloud|strong="H7311"\w*! Don’t \w spare|strong="H2820"\w*! \w Lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w your|strong="H5046"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shofar! \w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H3290"\w* disobedience, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w their|strong="H3290"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w know|strong="H1847"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*. \w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* didn’t \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* judgements. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* draw \w near|strong="H7132"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

‘\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*,’ \w they|strong="H3117"\w* say, ‘\w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* don’t \w see|strong="H7200"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* don’t \w notice|strong="H3045"\w*?’ “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6031"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* labourers.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w contention|strong="H7379"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* fist \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*. \w You|strong="H3117"\w* don’t \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* chosen? \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w humble|strong="H6031"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w bow|strong="H3721"\w* \w down|strong="H3721"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w spread|strong="H3331"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ashes under \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*? \w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?

“Isn’t \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* chosen: \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w release|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bonds|strong="H2784"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w undo|strong="H5425"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* straps \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w yoke|strong="H4133"\w*, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H7533"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w break|strong="H5423"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w yoke|strong="H4133"\w*?

Isn’t \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* distribute \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* bring \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w who|strong="H6041"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* cast \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*; \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hide|strong="H5956"\w* yourself \w from|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* own \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w light|strong="H7837"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H1234"\w* \w out|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w morning|strong="H7837"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* healing \w will|strong="H3068"\w* appear \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w*; \w then|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* rear guard.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*. \w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w help|strong="H7768"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w Here|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w*.’ “\w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w amongst|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w yoke|strong="H4133"\w*, finger \w pointing|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* wickedly;

\w and|strong="H5315"\w* if \w you|strong="H5315"\w* pour \w out|strong="H6329"\w* \w your|strong="H6031"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7646"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* \w the|strong="H7646"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, then \w your|strong="H6031"\w* light \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w rise|strong="H2224"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H6031"\w* \w obscurity|strong="H2822"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7646"\w* \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w guide|strong="H5148"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* dry \w places|strong="H4161"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* make \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* strong. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w watered|strong="H7302"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spring|strong="H4161"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* whose \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* don’t \w fail|strong="H3576"\w*.

\w Those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w* \w places|strong="H2723"\w*. \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w many|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*. \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Repairer|strong="H1443"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Breach|strong="H6556"\w*, \w Restorer|strong="H7725"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Paths|strong="H5410"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* Dwellings.

“If \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w delight|strong="H2656"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*, \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* own \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3117"\w* \w finding|strong="H4672"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* own \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3117"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* own \w words|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w delight|strong="H6026"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* feed \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father;” \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.
